ygData.subject: Re: stacking
ygData.msgSnippet: When you mesmerize something, it basically forgets what it is doing... until you blast it again of course ;) Fiera Mindbender [BAD] Erudite Enchanter-Xegony .
ygData.messageBody:
When you mesmerize something, it basically forgets what it is doing... until
you blast it again of course ;)

Fiera Mindbender [BAD]
Erudite Enchanter-Xegony
.
----- Original Message -----
From: osmosis <osmosis@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 27, 1999 4:01 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] stacking


> From: osmosis <osmosis@...>
>
> I've read that the haze line will stack... what exactly does this mean?
It
> certainly wont stack with mist.
>
> Also last night I mesmerized a carrion ghoul out of a train in unrest,
> quite a ways above me on the level chart. The most interesting thing was
> tat not only did he stop in his tracks he was STUNNED! I use this spell
> quite often (as YOU should) and it seems as though the stun is quite
> random, and fairly rare. Dont ask me how I hit that MOB with it though, I
> havent figured that one out yet, I ws notified that this ghould was at
> least level 20, 7 levels above me.
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> It's finally here! What's your opinion?
> http://www.onelist.com
> Create a Star Wars discussion group at ONElist.
>
